text:
The replacement of
soil performed in connection with the strip-mining of coal, which coal moves in
interstate commerce, is not a process or occupation directly essential to the
production of the coal. Employees engaged only in such activities are therefore
not covered on an individual basis.
html: The replacement of soil performed in connection with the strip-mining of coal, which coal moves in interstate commerce, is not a process or occupation directly essential to the production of the coal. Employees engaged only in such activities are therefore not covered on an individual basis.
